user_instruction: 'Send Ethan the details for the book cover design (ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for “Whispers of the Past” Cover Design Details  

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well! Could you please send me the full brief and any reference materials for the “Whispers of the Past” cover? You can pull everything directly from your Notion workspace and email it to me at ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com.

Thank you very much for your help.

Best regards,  
Ethan

final_output:

Best regards,  
Ethan
